about_the_game:
Fields of Gold is a charming and engaging casual farming game where your goal is to transform plots of land into a prosperous farm.
Begin your journey by tilling small patches of earth, growing and harvesting a variety of crops. As your farm flourishes, you can expand your fields and unlock the ability to build manufactories, where your crops are processed into valuable goods. Each successful harvest and expansion brings new challenges and opportunities, testing your farming skills and strategic thinking.

But it's not all peaceful farming – watch out for the cheeky rabbits that are always on the hunt for tasty crops – especially yours! Arm yourself with dynamite and protect your fields from these ravenous invaders.

Will you turn your Fields of Gold into a thriving agricultural empire, or will the rabbits have the last laugh?
